DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy safety ASP1941 placebo Japanese patient type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy Safety ASP1941 Japanese Type 2 Diabetes Patients
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic patient least 12 week HbA1c value 7.0 10.0 % Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 20.0 45.0 kg/m2 Investigator adjudicate subject able discontinue currently take hypoglycemic agent safely treatment Type 1 diabetes mellitus patient Serum creatinine > upper limit normal Proteinuria ( albumin/creatinine ratio > 300mg/g ) Dysuria and/or urinary tract infection , genital infection Significant renal , hepatic cardiovascular disease Severe gastrointestinal disease
